CustomField.formula:
IF(TEXT(YEAR(TODAY()))= "2020", "Last Year: " & TEXT(Bundles_YTD_2019_RUS__c) & BR() & "This Year: " & TEXT(Bundles_YTD_2020_RUS__c) & BR(),
IF(TEXT(YEAR(TODAY()))= "2021", "Last Year: " & TEXT(Bundles_YTD_2020_RUS__c) & BR() & "This Year: " & TEXT(Bundles_YTD_2018_RUS__c) & BR(),
'no information'
))
CustomField.label: Bundles YTD
